one_reviews_text: So I will say it’s not very long but there’s so much happening all at once you’ll want to watch it a few times to take it all in! Amazing graphics! I’d love to have a full length film like this!

Nice experience from this intro, but i expected better graphics from a Unreal-game.
Yea it is short but like WOW and I mean WOW. Wasnt expecting what was coming but super cool either way. Ye this would be a fantastic game a one that defies reality with VR SUPER COOOL!

review_title: Great demo for those new to Rift!
one_reviews_text: Love showing this off to the Rift nubes!
cool little video

Super epic but short experience! All scifi fans or giant robot fans or fans of epic stuffs in general should try this experience as it's free!!!

This will be my go-to demo to those without VR as from now.

By the way I have based my review on it being a demo and not as a full blown AAA game title as some have.
People giving this one star because they can't "play" it need to learn how to read.  This a quick demonstration of the capabilities of VR...AND it is outstanding.

This is how all FPS VR games should be.
I really hope they make it into a real game before the rift retires,  best 20 secs of eye candy on oculus so far.

one_reviews_text: stop given bad reviews because its not a game :) if you want a cool video to show off the rift then this is it ...

Too short and there's almost no interaction.
Short but worth the money.. oh wait, it's free ofc. Great intro to VR, middle of the slow-mo action on the streets of futuristic city, android cops fighting the giant alien robot, very cool.
A cool demo of the capabilities!
25 seconds of moving graphics. thats it. sit back, watch 25 seconds of slow moving stuff flying at you at you wait for the demo...video..clip...? whatever that was to be over.

This is incredible!  Is this going to be a game?  I would gladly pay the $$ to purchase this.  You guys are INCREDIBLE!  As someone who never did gaming until Oculus Rift, I am blown away by the experiences and fun.  Way to go guys and gals.  If you need some "newby" thoughts or to try it out, let me know! :-)
The whole thng didn't last no more than about a minute give or take. You can't do anthing but look around as your being pulled directly to the robot. Not worh downloading.

I was started to lose interest in my Oculus, as the games were getting very routine and a lot of money, for very little.  This was amazing, of course only a short demo of the graphics capability, but this should be the standard for future games/app on VR
It's short but an excellent demonstration about VR capabilities. Very high level graphics.
It's like a teaser trailer to a high budget sci fi action film. It's free and very high quality. Good for demoing.
but a great one
Why is not more non-interactive experiences like this? I would pay for that gladly.
This is lame

A very immersive and short masterpiece. This is what VR is about! Loved it so much that I even made my family go through the experience one by one and they all left wanting more!

10/10

i was spending 2 hours to play this and it was just a slow motion video?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!
Perfect demo to show your friends. Awesome audio.

Extremely short VR experience, but well worth a look if you love action or sci-fi. It reminded me a little of Robo Recall, and gives a hint of what a multiplayer version of that game would be like. Nice ending and a buildup of action to the climax.
Nice short quick action vr clip that you can show to someone new to high end vr, on what it could be like being inside an action paced vr game!

review_title: One of the best for the visuals - SHORT
one_reviews_text: One of the best experiences so far for the visuals but ultra short (less than a minute). Would have been nice to be able to see the full speed scene!
Very short worthwhile experience.
Definitely should try out when you first get VR

I rarely give 5 stars but this app is one of the first I ever tried about a year ago, and still I use it as a first experience when demo-ing the Rift to friends.  It's just so good.  It's very short and the audio work is great.  Play  it loud and you'll feel more immersed in it.  The audio and slow-motion visuals make this an awesome, immersive experience, and one app that I can say hasn't wilted over time.  Top job.
This is in my lineup for things that I show people who have never tried VR. It's a perfect length and has that wow factor.

This is one of those virtual reality experiences that everyone should be watching at least once. We all have family and friends that are interested in VR and this is the perfect VR experience to show people. Just warn them that it does get a little bit scary at the end and remind them that no matter how amazing it looks it’s not real. There isn’t much to do with this experience other than hold on and enjoy the ride. By pressing up and down you can compare the forward and deferred renderer (shows how clear the graphics are even at a distance) by pressing left and right to change the pixel density for each renderer. But it’s best to just play it full pelt and enjoy it as it should be seen.
I think this is to show off what could be done.
30 seconds of coolness.
dont waste my ffffffff time with download s likje this pleasse delete this crap ........
Short video that can blow your mind if you are new to VR.  Should be part of a "welcome to oculus" bundle everyone needs to do first.
A short but great run, puts war and dangerous situations into a different perspective. War is loud and scary

Good thing, recommended.
Minus 1 star for being tooooo short.
But you must check this out!

has to be seen to believe.no word describe it
its blown away all my friends and family who have sat down and eperienced it.
10 out of 10
Really well made. Worth to try.

review_title: Wow, thats sooo perfect and real!
one_reviews_text: If you want to make somebody to run crazy for VR, then show him this Demo. Its one of the best things i found in VR up to now. Will it become a game? I really hope so, its sooo perfect!!!
WOW!!!!!!!, when is this coming out? My money is ready, looks fantastic compared to other titles.

Great title to let first-timers experience what VR is; just viewing in slow-motion, no interactions, thus easy to get started. You can move around, look underneath, etc. without motion-sickenss. It's fun to watch your family/friends react, then totally freakout at the end; shhh! It looks like "Robo Recall" may be the fruition of this concept demo. Makes you wonder what it would be like if Hollywood movies ever came in this format.

review_title: First VR thing to make me jump!
one_reviews_text:
Stop reading this. Just go download it and see for yourself.

Sets the bar for things to come!
Outstanding!!! The graphics, the bullet time play, the whole package was nothing short of mind blowing! Great for a demo about the future potential of VR!
OMG, it's the Unreal Engine on Steroids...watch out all others!

Boy oh boy, watch this video it is amazing! This is what the future of VR needs to be (as we are really in the start). All we need is some sort of treadmill like the "Virtuix Omni Gaming" add that, in conjunction with a Game like this Video, and man.....if the future will be like this for VR I can't wait.
One of the most amazing spectacles to demonstrate the strength of VR

It is an anticipated title.
The best!

The detail and effort that went into this immersive video is phenomenal! The camera move slowly which is good news for those with VR sickness issues. The movement is slow enough where it is a good way to get yourself used to VR and rid yourself of that "motion sickness" feeling.
cant wait for robo recall or any other game like this!
Nothing seems to be better than this one so far, the graphics and environment is absolutely brilliant. A must-try for everyone.
the end is so scarry.no matter how many time l watch it
This is short but it is very sweet indeed. I must admit keeped me a bit tense
Great way to show off VR to friends and family!

A precursor to Bullet Train, which was a precursor to Robo Recall.  This is a cinematic that showed the potential of VR at the time, but isn't particularly impressive along side the game that ended up coming from it.  It's historically interesting, but nothing you're going to come back to with the likes of Robo Recall available.
It's one of the first experiences I show to friends and family.
Great for showing off what the rift can do to friends/family.
I wish there were more content like this, its awesome
This is the greatest thing I have ever witnessed, easily over a hundred times.  More conted like this please!!!
Definately the demo to show your mates if you want to impress them.

review_title: Great for demoing to first-time friends
one_reviews_text: Jaw-droppingly beautiful to watch, and a splendid introduction to VR for your naysayer friends when you finally convince them to put on the Rift.
Most impressive VR experience I have seen to date
I've been tooling around in the Oculus for the better part of two weeks, and it's neat, but rarely breathtaking.  This is breathtaking.
boring, just some action animation
Perhaps the single best demo in the Oculus store, DreamDeck included
awsome
Best quality on store.
essential
Short but WOW! Suitable for demoing VR!
awesome we need a movie like this in vr

review_title: A great little animation for intros
one_reviews_text: As an intro for showing friends what VR can be on decent hardware this and DreamDeck is a great little tease. I just hope we'll see like a bigger gallery of these, that we can maybe manipulate a bit to bend the physics as the video plays through to really sell that this is what youre missing out on when watching 360 Video
Actually the best one for Oculus but too short!! Just want the following now ;)
For a tech demo it's stunning.  I can't wait to try games that look as good as this.  A bit too short though.
